attributes.action: make my school let robert hanlon-sawyer keep his hair the way it is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my school is trying to make me take the blonde out of my hair saying it is an extreme of fashion but there are girls who have dyed there hair white and red and they say my situtation differs 

but i believe there just been sexist because im a boy and they havnt told the girls off once

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
